articles.content: Spain's nervy, gritty 1-0 win at Greece on Thursday has put them on the cusp of a World Cup spot. Though there are still plenty of ways it could all go horribly wrong. ARIS MESSINIS/AFP via Getty Ima… [+9231 chars]

articles.title: Cornes calls out AFL skipper over Walker claim - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Port Adelaide great Kane Cornes has cast doubt on suggestions Taylor Walker will “seamlessly fit in” to Adelaide’s playing group after the former Crows captain was involved in a racism scandal earlier this year.
articles.content: Kane Cornes has expressed doubts about how Taylor Walkers teammates will welcome him back on his return to the Adelaide Crows.Port Adelaide great Kane Cornes has cast doubt on suggestions Taylor Walk… [+2819 chars]

articles.author: Dave McMenamin
articles.title: Anthony Davis rips Los Angeles Lakers after 'embarrassing' loss to Minnesota Timberwolves - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Anthony Davis went off on the Los Angeles Lakers after an "embarrassing" loss to the Timberwolves on Friday night in which his team once again struggled in the third quarter.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES -- Anthony Davis unloaded on the Lakers after Friday night's 107-83 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves that was largely determined by a third quarter in which his team was outscored 40-12… [+4071 chars]
